jetpack-related-posts.title: Curriculum
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: HOME SCHOOL SUPPORT During the current Covid-19 outbreak situation we will be adding links to useful learning opportunities and resources here. These will be in sections relating to classes, subject leaders or additional need pupils and each section will be in order of publication with the most recent content at…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Home
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: CORONAVIRUS / COVID 19 - SCHOOL PROVISION UPDATE Updated: 29/08/20 09:30 Springvale Primary, in-line with government guidelines, we have now extended provision to all pupils from Wednesday 2nd September 2020. Please refer to the 'curriculum' section of the website for home learning materials and free online resources or please see…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Physical Education (PE), Sport and Dance
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Our PE, dance and sport team is led by Mrs N Exley. Please feel free to ask her for any advice or support required. Our PE link Governor is Mr Andrew Noble.   Some free PE resources during school closure (more on the main 'curriculum' start tab...) real PE at…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Policies
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Welcome to our policies page!  All of our policies will be reviewed over a three-year period and, once ratified by Governors, they will appear here.  If you would like a copy of a policy not listed here please contact the School Office.  The policies in bold have been agreed through…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Pupil Premium/Sports Premium
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Pupil Premium Pupil premium is a designated amount of money that the government allocates to each school, based upon a number of factors which are linked to the perceived deprivation of certain pupils in school. Information for Parents How Springvale spend the funding: 2016/17: 2016-17 PP spend 2017/18: 2017-18 PP…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Springvale FC
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Welcome to our Springvale FC page.  Here we will give you our latest news on results, fixtures and star players! We are passionate about coaching football for all ages, all abilities and both boys and girls. We have lots of teams to cover all ages and abilities as we believe…
